about_the_game:
Embark on an Epic Intergalactic Adventure

Cat-Astrophy invites you on a one-of-a-kind cosmic journey with Polo, a brave cat kidnapped by mysterious extraterrestrial forces. Explore vast starry spaces, face challenges on exotic planets, and fight to recover your lost memories while trying to find the way back home… and discover who caused such a cat-astrophe!

Game Features

  • Cosmic Exploration: Travel through unique worlds, each with its own mysteries and secrets. Follow the clues about Polo's past and forge your own destiny in a vast universe.

  • Dynamic Combat: Master a real-time combat system that combines strategy and skill. Use Polo's special abilities to defeat alien enemies and overcome challenges in intense battles.

  • Stellar Cursor: Control a stellar cursor to attack enemies while managing Polo's abilities in fluid and strategic combat.

  • Inventory Management: Organize and utilize a variety of items with unique synergies to maximize your efficiency in combat and exploration.

  • Ability Customization: Adapt and enhance Polo's abilities to suit your playstyle and face different types of challenges.

  • Permanent Upgrades: Use star fragments to unlock abilities and upgrades that persist between sessions, helping you overcome increasingly difficult challenges.

  • Permanent Death: Every decision counts, as death is permanent. If you fall in battle, you'll lose everything and must start over, testing your skills and choices.

  • Customizable Routes: Choose your own path in each playthrough, selecting the planets you wish to travel to. As you progress, you'll unlock new planets and routes to explore.

  • Eye-Catching Graphics: Enjoy stunning landscapes and alien creatures with a simple yet visually appealing style.

  • Deep Storyline: Uncover the dark motives behind Polo's abduction as you explore a narrative full of emotion, mystery, and surprising twists.

An Ambitious Project

Cat-Astrophy is a work that combines rogue-lite mechanics, strategic combat, and challenging resource management. Every planet is filled with unique details and challenges, promising an exciting adventure you won’t want to miss.

If you love challenges, cats, exploring increasingly diverse worlds, and epic adventures in visually stunning environments, Cat-Astrophy is the perfect game for you!
